N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 713-2.8 - Occupational therapy facilities

State Regulations

Occupational therapy facilities shall include the
following: (a) An activities area with
a sink or lavatory and facilities for collection of waste products prior to
disposal. (b) Storage for supplies
and equipment. (c) Residents'
toilet rooms, which may be shared with residents receiving physical therapy and
staff, if the approved narrative program reflects this sharing
concept. Notes
